name: cypress-test-framework
description: Cypress testing framework with Cucumber BDD

scripts.test:cypress: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=desktop && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:headed: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=desktop --headed && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:tag: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=desktop TAGS=$TAG && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:device:iphone: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=iPhone && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:device:pixel: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=pixel && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:device:ipad: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=iPad && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:device:android-tablet: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=androidTablet && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:all-devices: npm run test:device:iphone && npm run test:device:pixel && npm run test:device:ipad && npm run test:device:android-tablet
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "if(Test-Path reports) { Remove-Item -Path reports -Recurse -Force }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path reports,reports/screenshots,reports/videos,reports/cucumber"
scripts.setup: npm install && npx cypress install && npm run clean
